short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Random Bible Verse, this extension will load a random verse. Clicking the extension will fetch a new random Bible verse.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Random Bible Verse, this extension will load a random verse. Clicking the extension will fetch a new random Bible verse. Many verse at one click.
